com.u.tallerify.networking

Class AccessTokenManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.u.tallerify.networking.AccessTokenManager

  • public class AccessTokenManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Access token manager for credentials. This has the ability to read the current token (if existent) and to write a new one. Created by saguilera on 3/12/17.

    • Constructor Summary

      AccessTokenManager()

      Reads the current access token saved (if existent) and returns it

      • read

        public AccessToken read(android.content.Context context)
        Reads the current access token saved (if existent) and returns it
        Parameters:
        context - of the scope that wants to read
        Returns:
        access token, if persisted. Else null

      • write

        public void write(android.content.Context context,
                  AccessToken token)
        Write a new access token and persist it note: This will override any old token
        Parameters:
        context - of the scope that wants to write
        token - to persist
